author: Marwin Brown
title: Strawberry Oatmeal with Orange Juice
ingredients: 1/2 tbsp Clarified Butter (Ghee or regular unsalted butter)
1/2 tbsp Clarified Butter (Ghee or regular unsalted butter)

instructions:
Heat sauce pan over medium heat. Add ghee and then toast the oats for 1-2 minutes.
Add the orange juice, salt, almond milk, and oats then cook according to package directions (bring to a boil then simmer for 5 minutes).
Mix in the honey then top with the strawberry. Add zest and serve.
description: Creamy strawberry oatmeal recipe featuring old-fashioned oats cooked in almond-milk and orange juice based broth then topped with fresh strawberries for a totally not boring breakfast. #oatmeal #oatmealrecipes #strawberryoatmeal #breakfast #healthystart
instructions_list: Heat sauce pan over medium heat. Add ghee and then toast the oats for 1-2 minutes.
Add the orange juice, salt, almond milk, and oats then cook according to package directions (bring to a boil then simmer for 5 minutes).
Mix in the honey then top with the strawberry. Add zest and serve.
